TextAsset.value: BY MYSELF.
No, wait, I wanted to talk to someone…
This is something I have to do on my own.
DO IT
WAAAAAAIT!
TEAM UP WITH SOMEONE ELSE
Al.
Or Agent Albatross.
Or, whatever! It doesn’t matter.
We’ve been through so much together!
And, okay, it was largely based on lies and misunderstandings, but…
...there were good times too!
There were.
You taught me about staying true to myself and never giving up.
(Well, Pac-Man did that, but I helped!)
There’s only one way to get Pac-Man back.
I’m going to use the entire school’s supply of confiscated cheat codes.
But, Albatross! Cheat codes are dangerous weapons!
Sometimes, ${slot:playerName}…
Sometimes a level is poorly designed.
Or, like, the bad guys are super cheap HP sponges.
Sometimes, ${slot:playerName}, but just sometimes…
Cheat codes can put right what lazy designers did wrong.
It’s dangerous, but…
Who better to employ the righteous application of cheat codes for justice than Agent Albatross of the World Crime Police Organization!
Wait, Albatross!
It’s too dangerous. Maybe there’s another way...
Al.
We’ve been through so much together!
And, okay, it was largely based on lies and misunderstandings, but…
...there were good times too!
There were.
There’s only one way to get Pac-Man back.
I’m going to use the entire school’s supply of confiscated cheat codes.
But Albatross! Cheat codes are dangerous weapons!
Sometimes, ${slot:playerName}…
Sometimes a level is poorly designed.
Or, like, the bad guys are super cheap HP sponges.
Sometimes, ${slot:playerName}, but just sometimes…
Cheat codes can put right what lazy designers did wrong.
Wait, Albatross!
(Al looks like he could handle himself in a fight, so maybe I’d only show him down? Better keep looking…)
I think we’re out of options, ${slot:playerName}. Pac-Man is depending on us.
No. I can’t let you.
That really attractive but crazy guy isn’t here.
I wonder if he is mixed up in all this...
Shouldn't the Namco Anti-Real Criminal group be helping save the day?
Maybe... if funding hadn't been cut due to failures...
There’s only one way to get Pac-Man back.
Become that which we were fighting against...
But Albatross! Fighting fire with fire is no way to win!
Sometimes, ${slot:playerName}…
It is the only way.
It’s dangerous, but…
I believe in you!
Team up with Aki?
Aki! Let's fight together!
Wait, I'm not sure ...
Aki! Let's fight together!
I think we can do that. Is there room to pencil it in?
We can make it your 3:00.
What's my 3:15?
Studying for the school play!
Of course.
And don't forget to eat! A good meal means you can be running at 100%. Maybe even 150%!
Ooh, right. I forgot.
It's important to slow down for some of these essential things, Aki!
Right, right... Wait, who's the boss here?!
Hahahaha!
Hahaha! Well, we'd better knock this Pac-Man thing out so we can get back to work.
Are you ready?
I've got your back!
Right!
Activate the Amazona transformation sequence!
Let's save Pac-Man... And protect the earth! In a timely manner, mind you.
Ready to save Pac-Man? I want to bat this out so I can make it to my 3:00.
Aki! Let's fight together!
I think we can do that. Is there room to pencil it in?
Your schedule looks pretty packed...
Hmm... Well, maybe we can keep to the schedule if we rush it a bit.
This seems like the kind of thing we should really take our time on...
Let's take our time... Quickly!
Er... We're coming, Pac-Man!
Ready to save Pac-Man? I’m in a rush!
Aki! Let's fight together!
Did I have drama club or music club tonight? Oh shoot...
Umm... Pac-Man's kinda been kidnapped?
Er... Right... Hahahaha! Just trying to keep track of my schedule. It's been a little overwhelming, lately... I wish I had someone to help me keep up.
Oh... Well, we should probably do this...
Can it wait?
You mean Pac-Man? Being kidnapped? I don't think it can!
Oh... Okay... Well, a brief diversion couldn't hurt...
Just ... don't be surprised by what you see out there, okay?
(I don't think her heart's in it... )
(B-but battle brings out the warrior in all of us! It'll be fine! YEAH!)
I guess I can help? But I’m going to have to do my homework at the same time...
Aki's not here...
I hope she's okay.
She seems a little overwhelmed lately.
Team up with Anti-Bravoman?
Yes! I believe in him!
Should I believe in him… ?
Yes! I trust him!
Maybe not… he doesn’t even trust himself…
Anti-Bravo... Will you help me rescue Pac-Man from Evil Namco High?
I... Just don't know, ${slot:playerName}. I tried warning the other students, but they just wouldn't listen.
Can I be trusted? Maybe what the other students say is true...
I know what this means... To be going up against your former classmates.
But look deep inside of yourself...
... Into the gaping void of cosmic dust...
.... Um, way deep down...
... To the gloaming twilight dusk night of my soul...
... And ask yourself this:
If you're the darkness... The night...
Must not the night give way to the dawn?
(IS THAT REALLY THE BEST LINE I HAD?!)
(He'll never come around... )
You...
(Great... Now he's going to give up... )
YOU'RE RIGHT!
(WHAT.
Well... I'll take it.)
${slot:playerName}!
(Whoa! He grabbed my hand.)
We have to save Pac-Man! Come on!
We can't trust that guy!
Yeah!
I trust him!!
I trust ME too!
(Okay, that's not very convincing...
But I think we can work with it.)
I am the night... And Pac-Man is the sun! Namco High needs both!
Yup yes, uh-huh
(WHAT IS HE TALKING ABOUT)
We're coming Pac-Man!
Thanks for believing in me, ${slot:playerName}! I believe in you too.
Anti-Bravoman... Will you help me rescue Pac-Man from Evil Namco High?
I... Just don't know, ${slot:playerName}. I want to believe I can be good, but there's something dark deep inside of me...
We can convince the students to trust you!
${slot:playerName}... I don't even trust myself.
But... But I trust you!
I just... Don't know if it's enough.
It doesn't matter. We have to save Pac-Man. The rest...
(He seems ready for the battle...
But is he ready for what comes after?)
I don’t know if I’m ready for this… but if you trust me, then maybe it’ll be okay.
(He seems ready for battle… but is he ready for what comes after?)
Anti-Bravoman... Will you help me rescue Pac-Man from Evil Namco High?
${slot:playerName}... I'm glad you trust me.
But I don't trust...
Myself.
(What a dramatic thing to say... But it'll probably be fine... )
I don’t know if this is a good idea…
It’ll be fine! I think…
Hey Anti-Bravoman.
H-HEY.
What's wrong? You look nervous...
WHAT'RE YOU TALKING ABOUT. EVERYTHING'S GREAT. I DON'T HAVE ANYTHING TO DO WITH THE PLOT TO KIDNAP PAC-MAN.
I didn't ask if you did...
IT'S NOT LIKE I PUT A BAG OVER PAC-MAN'S HEAD AND HELPED THROW HIM IN A KIDNAPPING VAN DUE TO PEER PRESSURE FROM MY FORMER HIGH SCHOOL.
IT'S NOTHING LIKE THAT AT ALL.
ISN'T IT WEIRD THAT PAC-MAN IS JUST A BIG FLOATING HEAD?
ISN'T THAT WEIRD.
Oh-kaaaaay...
(What a suspicious guy... )
(I better leave him alone for now...
But I'll be back for him.)
ISN'T IT WEIRD HOW LIFE IS WEIRD SOMETIMES?
ISN'T THAT WEIRD.
Uhhhhhhhh...
YES, OF COURSE
HM, WAIT
DO NOT TEAM UP WITH MAX.
TEAM UP WITH MAX
KEEP LOOKING.
I can’t stop thinking about how we could REALLY use that plane right now.
(Hope I’m not too late.)
It’s a darn shame it’s not finished yet.
I know! If only we could have gotten our hands on all those design fragments sooner! We might have gotten the plane built by now!
Built?
Yeah! Y’know, maybe with Tomari’s help. Dunno if you and me could build a whole super plane by ourselves.
Oh, it’s already BUILT.
(WHAT?!?!)
WHAT?!?!
Yeah. Has been.
For ages.
Tomari did it over a weekend months ago.
Then what was all that about the 48 different designs we needed to heist out of the teachers’ lockboxes?!
Well, it’s built, but that doesn’t mean it’s DONE.
It’s still missing all the really important stuff.
(What’s he talking about?! It’s done or it’s not!)
Like what?
The cool decals.
Max. We’re getting that plane.
And we’re gonna save Pac-Man with it.
Without the decals? Y’sure?
Yes, I’m sure! We need air superiority, not decals!
They’re so often one and the same, but you’re right. This is a time for drastic actions!
Hm, I dunno. You make a good point about the decals. Gimme a few minutes to think it over.
I can’t stop thinking about how we could REALLY use that plane of yours right now.
Yeah. That thing would definitely tip the tide of any big End Fight.
It’s a darn shame it’s not finished yet.
If only we could have gotten the plane built by now!
Built?
Yeah! Y’know, maybe with Tomari’s help. Dunno if you and me could build a whole super plane by ourselves.
Oh, it’s already BUILT.
(WHAT?!?!)
WHAT?!?!
Yeah. Has been.
For ages.
Tomari did it over a weekend months ago.
At least I think he finished it...
You think?!?
Well, it’s built, it should work out fine... right?
Yes, I’m sure! We need air superiority!
You’re right. This is a time for drastic actions!
(Hmm. Well, Max wouldn’t be any good in a huge battle to rescue Pac-Man. I better team up with someone else!)
I’m ready when you are, ${slot:playerName}. Even without the rad decals.
Yes, I’m sure! We need air superiority, not decals!
They’re so often one in the same, but you’re right. This is a time for drastic actions!
I dunno… Lemme get back to you, Max.
(Everyone seems on edge today...
It feels like something's going to happen.)
ROAAAAAAR!!!
STUDENTS!
I HAVE DIRE NEWS!
PAC-MAN... HAS BEEN KIDNAPPED BY EVIL NAMCO HIGH!
The revelation is like a jackhammer, cracking my heart open like a geode of despair.
The very thought that someone could kidnap Pac-Man, my friend, and our beloved…
....... What does he do here, anyway?
It doesn't matter!
We’ve all wondered about that, but you’re getting off topic... We have to rescue him!
If only we could access the High Security Confiscatorium where all our special items are locked up!
I have the combination right here, students.
BECAUSE IT’S KING!
ROOOOOOAAAAAAR!!!
GO FORTH, STUDENTS... SAVE PAC-MAN!
HIS FATE... LIES IN YOUR HANDS!
(Okay who can I count on to help save Pac-Man?!)
With my trusty katamari by my side nothing will stop me…
NOTHING.
Team up with Davesprite?
Yes?!
Nah.
Are you sure you want to try to team up with Davesprite?
It's worth a shot!
He'll never do it anyway.
hey whats up
What do you mean, “what’s up?!”
Pac-Man has been kidnapped!!
Didn’t you see… all the stuff… that just happened?
yeah that was aiight
i should hang out with king more
he seems pretty chill
Aren’t you the least bit concerned?!
nah itll be fine
unless you screw up of course
Ugh! I don’t have time for this!
Davesprite! Thank goodness I found you!
youre barking up the wrong tree ${slot:playerName}
you havent done enough events with me
if you pick me you will definitely get the bad end
What?! How did you know I was going to ask-
Ugh! You are so frustrating!
Pac-Man’s been kidnapped, you know.
Don’t you think it’s a little inappropriate to still be going on about that stupid “game” fantasy of yours?
I mean, come on, this is serious.
Just put all that nonsense aside…
and I know you can help me save Pac-Man!
you havent listened to a word ive said this entire time have you
fine
if you dont believe me
whatever
thats cool
pick me if you want
lets see what happens
I don’t even know why I even bothered asking you in the first place.
probably because i have cool wings and look awesome
..Yeah…
whatever
O-okay… let’s do this…
(Suddenly I’m not too sure about my choice…)
(i wont say i told you so but yeah this is gonna suck)
Hey, Davesprite.
hey
im glad you came
just gonna say this once-
No, you listen.
I know you think this is all meaningless.
I know you think Pac-Man’s fate is already decided, for better or for worse…
And… since you were eerily right about what happened…
I’m not really sure what I believe anymore.
But I just came here to tell you…
I’m not gonna sit out this battle, even if you’re right about everything.
Pac-Man matters to me… This school matters to me.
You can join me in this fight if you want…
But I know you probably won’t.
...Okay, well.
I’ve said my piece.
I’m going now.
hey uh
im gonna come with you
if thats cool
That’s about what I expected.
I don’t know why I got my hopes-
Wait. What?!
You WILL?!
yeah i mean
i did some thinking and stuff
rapped with pac-man a little before he got kidnapped
and i figure
even if this is just a game
its where i live
its where i do my stuff
and more importantly
its where you are
you are pretty cool
Whoah, um…
Really?
yeah ${slot:playerName}
i mean that
i dont really know what the deal with you is
whether youre just part of the game or what
but you listened to me about my dumb problems
and you made me feel kinda better about what a weird loser i am
and look
you even came to give me a second chance after i was so cold to you
Wow. I haven’t heard you volunteer this much about your feelings…
Basically ever.
what
no way
i got tons of feelings
anyway
im just trying to say
as weird as this whole thing is
i guess i care about you and stuff
and if this whole thing is important to you
that means it is important no matter what
because like
what does importance even mean anyway
if it matters to someone i like
it just matters and thats it
even if im not sure any of this is strictly “real” in every sense of the term
Wow. That’s so deep.
yeah shut up
you get what im saying though right
Yeah…
I do.
ok so lets do this
caw caw...um, et cetera
What?
dont worry about it
you wouldnt get the reference
Team up with Donko to save Pac-Man?
Yes! Donko is my friend!
Hmm, I'm not sure.
Team up with Donko to save Pac-Man?
Yes! We can do it!
Not yet, there might be someone else I could team up with...
Let’s go, everybody!
We can save Pac-Man!
RAH! RAH!
Donko, why are you yelling like that?
Like, duh! I can use my popularity powers for the forces of good, you know!
With my help, I’m gonna rally everyone together to SAVE PAC-MAN!
Wow, Donko… you’re not as self-centered as I thought!
Watch it, honey!
I can, like, definitely turn this crowd against YOU if you sass me!
Hi, ${slot:playerName}...
Hey, Donko.
Look, I know we haven’t hung out recently…
I know. Did I, like, do something wrong?
I’m not going to FORCE popularity on you, or like, whatever…
I just thought that’s what you wanted, you know?
Donko…
There’s no time to worry about that now.
Bigger things are happening.
Besides, you’re my friend…
That’s all the popularity I need.
But, I’m like, just one person.
If you only have one friend, you’re not popular at all.
Well, I guess technically, but I was sort of trying to…
Make a point, or something…
Nevermind!
So, like...
Do you think we should team up? Maybe we could save Pac-Man!
You, like, really wanna team up with me?
Yes, Donko!
I know we can do it together!
The most popular student in the school, and…
The most, um…
Well, me! I’m sorta good too!
With our stuff combined, we can do it!
...Probably…
Uh…
Sure, I guess?
I mean, I’m not totally convinced, but…
Well, I like your moxie!
Moxie is totally in this year.
Let’s, like, do our best! We can drum-beat them together? I guess?
Uh…
YEAH!
Maybe…?
… Hi, ${slot:playerName}.
(I’m still a little mad at Donko…
But I won’t let her try to fake-cry again and get me to forgive her.
I have to remember to be strong and not fall for-)
I’m, like… so, so sorry.
...Huh?
I was being such a baby about the popularity thing.
The truth is...
I liked that you were so upfront with me.
You were new here, so you didn’t know my reputation…
You just, like, treated me like some regular person.
And I thought I liked it, but...
It was scary, you know?
I guess I chickened out… I’m like, a total coward.
I thought if I could make you popular, you’d appreciate how popular I was...
And then maybe you’d treat me like everybody else does.
But… that was like, a total mistake…
I totally understand if you can’t forgive me.
Wow...
Sniff… Sniff…
… This isn’t a very good apology… I guess I’m not perfect at everything, huh?
I finally get it. Pac-Man was right all along.
Donko, I’m the one who should apologize.
Huh? Like, what about Pac-Man?
Pac-Man told me to be true to myself, that includes being true to how I feel about you…
And to trust that your feelings were real too.
He tried to get me to understand that you were having a hard time, but I didn’t listen.
I was too obsessed with the idea that you were trying to trick me, or something.
I’m the one who was self-centered.
I should’ve trusted that your feelings were valid and real…
I’m so sorry, Donko.
Oh, ${slot:playerName}! SNIFF! OMG, you are SUCH a sweetheart...
I’m totally crying for real, I promise!
Don’t worry, Donko. I trust you now.
Poor Pac-Man… I wish I could tell him he was right. But it’s too late, now.
...Maybe it’s NOT too late though…
Maybe we can team up…
Maybe we could, like, save him!
You can get your katamari thingy back from the weapons locker now…
Maybe we, like have a chance!
What do you say, honey?
Should we, like, team up?
Yes… let’s do it!
Let’s… drumstick it to ‘em!
Teehee! You’re getting the hang of it!
...${slot:playerName}, I just want to tell you, in case things don’t, like, pan out…
I… I really like you! Just the way you are…
You’re like, totally real!
Unlike me… I’m like, totally useless.
Being cute doesn’t matter in a crisis.
But Donko… you’re not just popular because of your cuteness.
For one thing, you’re a talented musician…
The whole school knows it!
And you’re funny, and charming…
And you really care about the school.
That’s what’s most important…
Donko, you EARNED your popularity…
Because everyone can see how kind and caring and smart you are.
It’s not just because of your cute face.
${slot:playerName}…
(This is it… this is the big moment! It’s now or never…
I’ve never kissed a drum before…
But here I go!)
… It is a very cute face, though. <3
${slot:playerName}… OMG...
I wanted to tell you I like-liked you, but I didn’t know how...
(Heh. I guess being popular doesn’t keep you from being shy.)
I like you too, Donko…
But we’ll have time to talk about that later.
Use your popularity to rally the school!
Ok… EVERYBODY, LISTEN UP!
Donko speaking! You know me, of course!
Now’s not the time to slack off!
We’ve gotta, like, totally band together and save Pac-Man!
NOW, MARCH!
Donko… you’re right!
There’s no time to mope around!
Donko always knows what’s up around the school…
If she’s saying we can do it, we TOTALLY CAN!
COME ON, EVERYONE!
LISTEN TO DONKO!
See? They believe in you, and not just your cuteness.
${slot:playerName}…
Let’s go!
Eat the Power Up for Galaga?
Yeah! Let's power up and fight together!
UH HANG ON A SECOND.
Maybe someone else has a better plan...
I don't need power-ups to win! *Throw Out Pill*
Maybe someone else has a better plan...
Galaga Ship!
We’ve got to get Pac-Man back!
And you’re a spaceship with laser blasts and stuff.
It’s true. I’ve always considered being a spaceship to be a terrible curse, but you’ve made me realize that having a beautiful hull is just a part of what makes me…
GALAGA SHIP!
And here, now, finally, in this this big dramatic end battle sequence, being a spaceship can be good for a greater cause!
${slot:playerName}.
Grab that purple power up capsule.
Got it!
Now eat it!
Um. It’s bigger than my head.
And I don’t think it’s REMOTELY edible…
${slot:playerName}. it’s a power up. They’re always edible, even when they aren’t.
(Well, I can’t understand that logic OR argue with it…)
That power up will imbue me with DOUBLE THE FIREPOWER.
But if you eat it first, and THEN you hop into my pilot seat…
THAT WILL GIVE ME TRIPLE THE FIREPOWER!!!
HERE GOES!
Um…Wait a second though.
(Well, Galaga Ship is literally a spaceship built for shooting lasers and stuff. I’d only be in the way! Better team up with someone else…)
Are you ready to chug that power up, ${slot:playerName}?
HERE GOES!
I really don’t think I can eat power-ups. Especially this enormous one. Anyway, we really don’t have time for it even if I could...
I don't need to power you up, Galaga! You're perfect as is!
I do not believe that is accurate!
O-okay, but if we team up we can take on anything!
We are severely lacking in the firepower necessary to achieve victory.
(Okay maybe I shouldn't have been so hasty...)
(There is a swarm of students protecting Galaga, I can't get anywhere near it.)
Team up with Hiromi?
Hiromi! Let's fight together!
Maybe not...
Hiromi! Let's fight together!
Let's get Toby, too.
Is there time?!
It's not our first rodeo... Did I ever tell you how we met?
One of her enemies from the space war made it past the front line and landed in a parking lot outside Namco Mall.
A parking lot I'd just pulled into.
The alien was about to get me...
And then Toby rolled in like a cowboy.
She was so bright... She blinded me. Kissy's untouchable.
When the dust settled, I offered to give her a ride home...
It was cute.
Ready?
Hiromi! Let's fight together!
I'm not the fighter... I'm the driver...
But we have to fight! Pac-Man's in trouble!
I guess so...
(Er... Good enough! Let's do this!)
Hiromi! Let's fight together!
(....... A CONFIDENCE DESTROYING RESPONSE)
Hiromi! Let's fight together!
The road's calling, kid.
Huh?
Good luck.
HUH?!
(She walked away from me twirling her keys...)
(She's totally ignoring me...)
Team up with Jane?
Yes!
No!
Hey Jane… what’s with the disguise?!
What?! How on earth did you know it was me?!
I thought I could get the jump on Evil Namco High by concealing my identity.
Yeah, um… good idea…
Jane!
Hey listen, I was thinking…
Do you want to go rescue Pac-Man with me?
${slot:playerName}, don’t be silly.
There’s no such thing as a Pac-Man.
I’ll play along if you’d like, though!
You’ve been a pretty decent chum to me after all.
Humoring you is the least I could do! :B
(Yeahhh…
This is a bad idea, isn’t it.)
Sure, I’ll “save” this “Pac-Man” with you!
Hoo hoo! :B
Alright! This will be fun, won’t it?
Let’s do this!
Er, yeah…
Let’s… do this…
Jane! There you are.
I… I was just thinking…
Maybe if we teamed up…
We might stand a chance of saving Pac-Man.
More of this again?!
${slot:playerName}, I have tried telling you over and over, and I don’t want to be rude, but-
I’m not interested in your silly fairy tales!
And you can’t force me to believe in them!
So kindly stop trying!
Jane!
I’m not trying to force you to believe anything, okay?!
I just wanted you to come with me…
Because you’re my friend.
I… what?
Really?
Well…
Are you sure it’s me you want?
Gosh ${slot:playerName}, are you really sure?
Yes, I’m sure, Jane.
You’re my friend… I need you.
Gosh… I…
Of course I’ll come with you, if it’s important to you…
It doesn’t matter what either of us believe or don’t believe, really.
You’re my good friend, and I-
(But before she can finish her sentence…
Before we can even begin to fight Evil Namco High…
The enemy launches their first attack.
A projectile comes shooting towards us.
I jump to push Jane out of the way…
But it’s too late.
For both of us.)
(The world falls away into darkness.
I can feel my body getting lighter…
and lighter…
I guess I must be dead.
If this is what death is like…
It isn’t so bad…
At least it was sudden…
Wait a minute.
The light is getting brighter and brighter.
And brighter, and brighter…
I can feel my eyes opening…
And if I can open my eyes, that means-)
${slot:playerName}!
Thank goodness you’re alive!
Jane! That outfit…
That looks really good on you!
O-oh!
Golly, thanks…
Did you use your powers to push us to safety or something?!
Er…
Not exactly.
We both died.
Oh.
Wow.
But then…
I was revived, and I was wearing this outfit.
And I had these… Lifey powers…
I was able to restore you too.
It was… pretty unbelievable…
I’ve always heard fairy tales that if I were to die…
I’d come back as a “Maid of Life”...
But I always thought it was just silly nonsense.
Wow. Talk about your god tier in the machine…
I have no idea what this all is, but...
Now that these powers have awakened in me…
I would very much like to use them on those horrible jerkheads who killed us.
Yeah, I’m with you.
Come on, Jane! Let’s beat them and save Pac-Man, together!
Team up with Lolo?
Yeah! She has a soft heart deep down.
Let's see if there's anyone...more enthusiastic around.
Team up with Lolo to save Pac-Man, or is it too late?
It's not too late! Team up with Lolo!
Maybe there's someone here with a sunnier outlook...
I knew it.
Nothing that seems happy and nice ever lasts…
Lolo, can’t you think of anything more helpful to do right now?!
Don’t delude yourself.
Reminding everyone of how empty this all is…
That’s the only really “helpful” thing a person can do in this world.
YOU ARE SO ANNOYING
${slot:playerName}?
Why are you wasting your time talking to me?
Don’t you have some big idiotic last stand to make, or something?
Lolo… You can’t tell me you don’t care about Pac-Man getting kidnapped?
...Yeah, it sucks…
But what am I gonna do about it?
I’m useless… All of us are, actually.
This is all gonna end badly, no matter how hard you try.
Lolo…
I don’t believe that!
And I know you too well by now.
I don’t think you really believe that either!
(Uh… at least I hope she doesn’t…)
You’re wasting your time.
There’s no point in trying to fight them.
Even if we COULD beat them.
Lolo, you don’t REALLY believe that!
(Uh, I think…)
Lolo… let’s fight together!
Even if the odds are against us…
I know you care about me!
Uh…
Not… really.
...What? Seriously?
Yeah…
I kinda feel bad, but…
Also, I don’t, because who cares.
I mean, I’ll sorta fight with you if you want, but I’m not gonna do anything.
(Wow. Deep down…
She really DIDN’T care.
...I am a terrible judge of character.)
Lolo! I’m so glad I caught up with you.
${slot:playerName}, please.
It’s nice of you to want to make sure I’m okay-
You really don’t have to spend any effort, though.
This kinda stuff happens all the time.
But Lolo, I…
I didn’t understand what you meant.
If I knew you were saying…
Well, what I think you were saying...
I would’ve said yes…
I would’ve told you I like you back.
… Heh…
Geez, it sounds so embarrassing when you say it like that.
Lolo… I’m sorry.
I’ve been trying to figure out what bad thing happened to you to make you act like this.
Like I was trying to figure out a puzzle…
But you shouldn’t feel bad for feeling however you feel.
Or have to explain it to anyone but yourself.
Hanging out with you… The way you are now…
That’s what made me like you in the first place.
${slot:playerName}…
That’s… sweet, I guess.
But I don’t like feeling like nothing means anything.
It’s not something I want to feel.
That’s why I liked you… because you reminded me not everyone feels that way.
But I can’t help it… even though it’s making everything I care about fall away.
Now even Pac-Man’s been kidnapped.
There’s nothing we can do about it.
Namco High will fall…
and you’ll probably go away.
We might try to stay in touch for a while, but we’ll stop eventually.
Everyone always does.
It’s too late now…
Even if I want to be different.
You didn’t have to come back just to be nice…
It doesn’t matter anyway. It’ll be over soon.
I don’t think it is too late.
You can say you don’t care, Lolo, but to me…
It really seems like you do.
Maybe it’s true that people drift apart after high school.
Maybe it’s true that life isn’t fair, and people can try as hard as they can and still fail.
Maybe it’s true that some people’s ears are bigger than others, and that’s just always how it is.
But…
The fact that it bothers you so much…
It proves you DO care about people.
If you didn’t, you wouldn’t feel so empty and sad when you see OTHER people feeling empty and sad.
But when people lose friendships and fail and get lonely, you care so much that it hurts you…
You cut yourself off from others.
You might think this is a silly thing to say, but-
To me, the fact that it hurts you so much proves that you care more than anyone I’ve ever met.
${slot:playerName}…
I don’t know what to say…
Lolo…
Pac-Man helped me realize how I felt about you.
I was so stupid about it before.
Thinking of you as a question I had to answer…
Not seeing the feelings I had right in front of me.
But he helped me, so…
I have to rescue him.
I owe him that much.
And I’d like you to come with me and help me…
You studied so hard to be a priestess and use magic before.
Even if you feel like you failed, I know you must have power within you...
And even if you don’t…
I hope… you might want to be… by my side.
(She’s not answering…
Did I make her angry?)
${slot:playerName}…
What if you’re wrong about me?
Huh?
I want to believe what you said.
But what if I really don’t care deep down…
What if this is just me?
What if this is how I’ll always be?
Well…
You said Klonoa was a good person, who didn’t mean to make you feel bad.
Maybe you could… do the opposite.
Huh?
What do you mean?
Maybe you could do a good thing, even if you don’t care about it.
You could make people feel
good
by accident, instead.
And then in the end… there’s no difference!
As long as something good happens.
What do you say? Will you give it a try?
I have a feeling that if you do that-
You’ll feel good that you did it anyway.
Kinda like… how forcing yourself to smile makes you happy.
Heh…
You’re so corny.
I can’t believe a person like you really exists.
(Haha. Even though she said that, I can’t help but notice-
She still held my hand, when I offered it.)
By the way, Lolo…
I really like your ears, actually.
I think they’re the cutest thing about you.
Oh, shut up already!
Let’s just get this over with.
Not that it matters anyway…
Haha. Whatever you say.
Team up with Meowkie to save Pac-Man?
YES! We can do it!
Maybe someone else would be a better teammate…
Time is running out! Stay with Meowkie and stand by her against Evil Namco High?
Yes! She’s the most important person at the school to me.
Maybe I can find someone who’s NOT freaking out…
Nyaa! Pac-Man’s been kidnapped! We gotta do somethin’, Boss!
P-please hurry!
Even a Hall Monitor like me can’t do nothin’ by herself!
Meowkie! Thank goodness I found you!
Boss… you were really lookin’ for me?
What for? Look how useless I am.
Even if I did still have my Hall Monitor badge, I couldn’t have done anything to save Pac-Man…
Meowkie! I don’t care who you are, or where you’re from…
Or how many Hall Monitor badges you have.
You’re a great person, and I think we can take on Evil Namco High… together!
Boss…
That’s awful nice of ya, but…
I’m just a cat, and you’re just a… little Katamari person…
Are you sure we can do it, uh, by ourselves?
Not that I’m doubtin’ ya or nothin…
(Now that she mentions it… it does seem pretty unlikely.
But…)
Boss… are you sure you wanna team up?
I know it seems really improbable…
But we can do it!
We can take on Evil Namco High all by ourselves, and save Pac-Man!
Uh, alright Boss!
Whatever you say!
I’m with ya to the end!
Thanks Meowkie!
I’m pretty sure this will turn out well.
…Kinda sure, anyway.
Well, in any case, if stuff goes wrong, at least we got nine lives!
What? I don’t have nine lives.
Oh, is that just a cat thing?
...Yikes.
(Ulp…)
Well, here goes nothing…
Meowkie?
Huh, this is where she usually sits...
Meowkie, are you there?
Nyaa... I’m here, Boss...
Huh???
Meowkie... I hear your voice... But...
Are you a ghost???
Did you use up your ninth life?!
Nyah?? Boss, what are you talkin’ about?
You’re scarin’ me...
Oh, wait...
You’re just hiding under your desk.
(If I bend down, I should see her...)
What are you doing, Meowkie?
I’m scared, Boss...
What, the ghost thing?
No, I was wrong about that.
Jeez Boss! I know I’m not a ghost!
But maybe it’d be better if I was...
All the other students...
They were all right about me, after all.
Why, Meowkie...
Why would you ever say that?
They were right...
I really am just an evil Meowkie...
Because now that Pac-Man's been kidnapped...
I’m really, really angry.
I can’t stop feeling this way...
It feels like all I have inside me!
I can’t even pull my claws back in....
Meowkie...
I’m really really sorry, Boss...
I know you believed in me.
I tried real hard to be good.
...${slot:playerName}…
I’m real sorry…
...I never wanted to get angry…
...But I am… which means I’m as bad as they say.
But getting angry at something like this is the right thing to do!
Getting angry when something bad happens IS good!
… b-but... how can that be?
Because anger is just... a reaction.
Like feeling sad when someone breaks your heart.
If you didn’t feel bad when that happened...
It would mean you didn’t have any feelings about it to start with!
When someone you love gets hurt...
It’d be wrong to have a happy feeling about that.
Is that really so hard to understand?
Anger is something natural.
It’s what everyone feels.
It’s what everyone’s SUPPOSED to feel, at least sometimes!
It isn’t “bad” or “good”.
Even if it does feel bad sometimes.
It doesn’t feel good to be sad, either...
But I’d rather be sad over a heartbreak...
Than not have felt anything at all.
Boss. Is your heart...
Are you really heartbroken, over me?
J-jeez...
W-well, actually...
No.
I mean... I’m sad our date didn’t go well...
But what I feel right now isn’t sadness.
To tell the truth...
I’ve been pretty angry lately, myself.
NYAA? WHAT, REALLY?
Boss, how could YOU get angry?
You’re so nice... You’re so good!
You’re, like... a hero or somethin’!
Haha. I don’t know about that.
But yeah, I’ve been feeling pretty angry.
...Okay... Yeah, Boss.
I think I get what you’re sayin’.
You’re angry about Pac-Man gettin’ kidnapped, too.
Not just Pac-Man, Meowkie!
I’m angry because...
Of how the other students here have been treating you.
You cared so much about how I was treated...
That it’s been makin’ you real angry?
All this time?
I care about you, Meowkie.
If I wasn’t upset at how you were treated...
I think I’d be a pretty heartless person.
Boss...
I mean, ${slot:playerName}.
I dunno what to say...
Evil Namco High is about to get away with kidnapping Pac-Man and attacking the school.
Meowkie...
How does that make you feel?
...U-um... pretty angry...
I guess.
Yeah, me too.
Then let’s show them how mad we are...
U-um... Together!
(...She’s… she’s grabbing my hand… We’re holding hands...
...Er, holding paws? Her claws are pretty sharp...)
${slot:playerName}... Come here...
For good luck!
(I... I can’t believe it...
She licked me on the cheek...
Her tongue is pretty sharp too, actually...
But still...
I’ll never wash this face again!)
(YOU TWO! ${slot:playerName}! MEOWKIE!)
Eep!
Y-yes, Boss?
ROAR!!!
He says-
“If you two are about to head into the ring-
AGAINST ALL ODDS!
Then you both deserve...
A MIGHTY PROMOTION!!!”
(King’s tossing something through the air at us...)
Oop! I caught it!
What is it? Do I even want to know?
It’s two brand-new Hall Monitor badges...
One for each of us.
ROAR!
(I’M EXTREMELY PROUD OF YOU BOTH!)
(He... doesn’t SEEM proud...)
King…
Thank you…
Heh.
C’mon, ${slot:playerName}...
Let’s show em what happens when you tick off a couple of official Hall Monitors!
Er...
I-I mean... if you want to.
...Yeah.
After you, Boss.
Ummmmm?
Team up with Mr. Driller! He doesn’t need drills to be awesome!
Let’s see who else is available first.
Team up with Mr. Driller?
Yeah! We can do it!
Let’s not be too hasty.
What kind of scum would kidnap Pac-Man?!
The kind of scum that comes from Evil Namco High.
We’ve gotta save him!
Don’t worry, ${slot:playerName}! We’re on it!
DIGGING CLUB, ASSEMBLE!
MR. DRILLER AND HIROMI!
...I’m going to do my own thing to save Pac-Man.
Good luck, though.
Oh! Okay! Thanks, Hiromi!
Hey ${slot:playerName}- do you think she likes me?
Uh, now’s not really the time, man.
Hey, Mr. Driller!
Hi ${slot:playerName}….
Oh… you’re still super depressed, huh?
I wouldn’t say I’m depressed…
Just that my life has no meaning.
Mr. Driller… come on! You’ve got to pull yourself together!
I’m asking you as your friend…
For the sake of all we’ve been through…
Team up with me! We’ve got to rescue Pac-Man!
King opened the locker, so you can get your drills back! Let’s go!
Ok, but…
I promised myself I wouldn’t drill anymore, and I meant it.
Even if I could get my drills back, I won’t use them.
Do you still want to team up with me…?
If you team up with me, I won’t use my drills…
But I guess I can sorta punch the bad guys?
It’s thumb on the inside, right?
Let’s go, Mr. Driller!
I believe in you!
(Sort of…)
Son! What are you doing?!
Dad! Dad, look!
We’re gonna go rescue Pac-Man, and I’m not gonna resort to digging to do it!
It’s just like you wanted!
Are you proud of me?
(Oh! Maybe this will give him the surge of confidence he needs to-)
Hmmm… let’s see how you do before I go saying things I can’t take back.
No offense, but you sometimes crack under pressure.
Mr. Driller, your dad is a jerk.
...Yeah, I know.
Let’s get this over with…
Mr. Driller!
Pac-Man’s been kidnapped! We have to save him!
I can’t believe it… Pac-Man, of all people!
We just talked to him!
We have to do something.
We have to save him!
Yeah, but I saw Dad grabbing my drills away as soon as King opened the locker.
He REALLY doesn’t want me digging anymore...
Even in an emergency like this!
I’m so sorry, ${slot:playerName}.
Without my drills, what can I do?
I’m useless.
...Unless… maybe you and me can team up?
Maybe with the power of… um, you know… heh heh…
Hee hee, yeah?
...Maybe if I have that, I don’t NEED to dig?
I know I don’t have much to fight with…
But… I like you so much, ${slot:playerName}…
With you by my side, I’m sure I won’t lose!
That actually sounds pretty nice…
But…
I’ve got a way better idea.
Huh??
Stay right there! I’ll be back in a flash!
What could ${slot:playerName} possibly be up to?
What took you so long?
Everyone else is almost ready to go fight Evil Namco High!
I had to go talk to someone…
Someone else who wants to fight at your side.
Dad?
What…
What are you doing here…
Why did you bring my drills…
And... yours, too?!
Your friend here came and told me what you said…
About why you loved digging.
You love it because of the good memories you have with me…
Is that right, son?
Y-yeah, it is.
It made me realize…
It’s not just about digging.
It’s about family, and doing things we love together.
Son… please dig with me again.
I don’t want you to lose that!
But… what about Mom?
I know it’s a sad situation, but…
It’s wrong to blame the digging for that, too.
It wasn’t the digging that drove her away…
It was me, because I didn’t pay attention to her.
If I want you to avoid making the same mistakes I made…
Then we’ve both got to learn moderation!
And there’s only one way to do that.
...Practice.
${slot:playerName} here is very persuasive. I wouldn’t have thought I could be convinced so easily, but ${slot:playerName}’s passionate speech about the power of love… it really moved me.
I can’t really take the credit, sir!
I learned all about what it means to be passionate… from you, Mr. Driller.
${slot:playerName}…!
...Don’t talk about my son like that.
You have triple detention, ${slot:playerName}.
Aw, WHAT!
There’s not much time! Evil Namco High is attacking!
${slot:playerName}… Is it really okay if I go with my dad instead of you?
That’s what I hoped would happen when I went to dig the old man up!
I’ll be helping with the rest of the school, don’t worry.
I really can’t thank you enough for what you did…
But maybe this’ll have to do.
(Omigosh! He kissed me on the cheek!
In front of his family and everything…)
See you when I get back.
… Quadruple detention, ${slot:playerName}.
SERIOUSLY?!
Alright, shall we go?
I gotta admit, I haven’t dug in a while…
I’m a little rusty.
It’s okay Dad. You’ll get the hang of it!
(There they go, father and son, off to save Pac-Man…
I know they can do it.
...Even if his dad is kind of a jerk.)
Team up with Nidia?
Nidia...will you fight with me?
Keep looking...
Cheer Nidia on?
Yeah!
Maybe not…
Team up with Nidia?
Yeaaaaah?
I don’t feel too good about this…
Nidia... Will you fight with me?
I want to, but ${slot:playerName}... Do you remember what you said?
I said you should choose your own interpretation of the prophecy.
Yes... And I just wanted to tell you... I've been enjoying my newfound disregard for strict interpretation.
Sherlock Holmes is VERY different if you allow for a ... Looser interpretation of the text.
I see....
.... VERY DIFFERENT....
(I think she's feeling better now... I'm glad.)
Hmm? Sorry, got lost in thought there. What were we talking about?
.... Saving Pac-Man?
OH! Right. I'm going to try taking your advice. I'm going to accept every part of myself and wish the hardest I've ever wished. I'm going to use that amulet to turn into a dragon.
I want to do this... On my own.
I believe in you, Nidia!
Thank you, ${slot:playerName}!
(She's raising the amulet... )
Is it okay if I face this trial alone, ${slot:playerName}?
Nidia... Will you fight with me?
I want to, but ${slot:playerName}... Do you remember what you said?
I said you should try using the amulet on your own, if you want.
Yes... I'm going to try. I'm going to accept every part of myself and wish the hardest I've ever wished.
I want to do this... On my own.
I just... Hope it works.
I believe in you, Nidia!
Thanks ${slot:playerName}... Here goes nothing.
Cross your fingers.
(She's raising the amulet... )
Is it okay if I face this trial alone, ${slot:playerName}?
Nidia.. Let's fight together!
I don’t know ${slot:playerName}. I don’t think I can go with you. But if you want, I’ll cast protective magicks on you from the sidelines…
Ummm...
(With the way she's talking... I'm a little worried about the outcome!)
I guess we have to do this, huh? No use fighting it…
Nidia... We have to save Pac-Man!
I guess so.
Uh... Everything ok?
Oh, everything's fine. It's not like no one will help me fulfill the prophecy, thus dooming the human race for eternity.
It's not like that at all.
O-okay...
... Hey, ${slot:playerName}... Have you seen Tomari around?
(Maybe I'll just ask... Someone else......)
Team up with Richard?!
Yeah!!
Keep looking...
We’ve got to rescue Pac-Man back from Evil Namco High!
I calculate the longer we wait the more dire the situation will become.
We should rush ‘em head on! They’ll never expect it and we may just take them by surprise.
I don’t know what Brains For Brains and Dinky Bird Kid are talking about, but I know that we're doomed!
Wait.
Rushing into action will only lead to chaos. We must assess the situation and act accordingly.
(Is Richard...actually pausing for thought? And taking his time?)
Details of enemy forces are sketchy at best. We’ve no way of knowing their capabilities or defenses!
Not so.
I think you’ll find my crazy conspiracy theorizing bore unexpected fruits!
Behold! My collection of dossiers.
INCLUDING, and this is the important part, an up to date list of all Evil Namco High students as well as their strengths and weaknesses.
With this information, our victory is assured!
Rushing into the fray without it would’ve gotten us all beat up pretty bad!
Richard, this is exactly what we were talking about!
You mean about how rude it was of Pac-Man to eat my grand romantic gesture of a picnic?
No. But, yeah it totally was!
But I mean the other thing, when Pac-Man helped us to learn about being true to ourselves.
Oh, yeah. I guess it is!
Now let’s go at a reasonable speed and get Pac-Man back!
Yeah! Prudent action and planning are awesome!
Maaaybe. Lemme think about it a bit more...
We’ve got to rescue Pac-Man back from Evil Namco High!
I calculate the longer we wait the more dire the situation will become.
We should rush ‘em head on! They’ll never expect it and we may just take them by surprise.
I don’t know what Brains For Brains and Dinky Bird Kid are talking about, but I know that we're doomed!
Wait.
Rushing into action will only lead to chaos. We must assess the situation and act accordingly.
(Is Richard...actually pausing for thought? And taking his time?)
Details of enemy forces are sketchy at best. We’ve no way of knowing their capabilities or defenses!
Not so.
I think you’ll find my crazy conspiracy theorizing bore unexpected fruits!
Behold! My collection of dossiers.
INCLUDING, and this is the important part, an up to date list of all Evil Namco High students as well as their strengths and weaknesses.
With this information, our victory is assured!
Rushing into the fray without it would’ve gotten us all beat up pretty bad!
Yeah! Prudent action and planning are awesome!
Maaaybe. Lemme think about it a bit more...
(Hmm, I dunno if Richard trusts ANYONE enough to be a good team player. Maybe it’d be better to team up with someone else…)
Prudent action and patience will see us through to victory!
Yeah! Let’s take on those Evil Namco High punks!
I’m just not sure, Richard…
We’ve got to rescue Pac-Man back from Evil Namco High!
I calculate the longer we wait the more dire the situation will become.
We should rush ‘em head on! They’ll never expect it and we may just take them by surprise.
I don’t know what Brains For Brains and Dinky Bird Kid are talking about, but I know that we're doomed!
Normally I’d be able to offer the dossiers I’ve been gathering through months of paranoid conspiracy theorizing…
(Is Richard going to save us all?!)
… but as it so happens, my dossiers all burned to a crisp when I wrote so fast that they burst into flames by the friction of my pen alone.
THAT’S DEFINITELY NOT POSSIBLE!
I hate when that happens.
Team up with Taira?!
Yes, Taira's the one for me!
Maybe someone else would be better...
So...are you saying you actually want to team up with me?
Yes!
Maybe someone else...
WAHHH! It’s all over, Cuz!
Pac-Man’s gone! We’re done for!
Yo, what did I ever do to deserve this?!
(Uhhhh…)
Yikes! Pull yourself together, Taira!
Aren’t you supposed to be, like, a big tough Wrestleball captain?!
Sniff… I don’t know WHO I am anymore…
And now it’s too late!
This is mad existential, yo!
(He sure seems to take things awfully hard.)
Okay… well, why don’t you go ahead and figure that out…
And I’ll go try to rescue Pac-Man.
Sniff… aw ${slot:playerName}, you’re SO RAD!
You can TOTALLY do it!
${slot:playerName}! Yo, I can’t believe it!
Pac-Man is totally gone!
I know! We can’t just sit here...
We’ve got to do something!
Waahh… It’s all over, Cuz!
IT’S ALL OVER!
I just wanna say… I’m mad sorry, yo!
For all those times I was a jerk and stuff!
It was so not awesome of me! WAAHHHH!
C-c’mon Taira… Pull yourself together, man…
You’re a big tough warrior guy, right?!
Sniff… I dunno, ${slot:playerName}…
I don’t even know anymore…
Who am I?!
This is mad existential…
… Listen, Taira…
I know we don’t always see eye to eye, but…
I feel like we have a connection.
No matter who you “really” are...
${slot:playerName}…
Are you saying you, uh, wanna team up with me?
Because that would totally RULE…
What do you say, Cuz?
Do you still wanna team up with me?
Yes, Taira….
I can’t think of anyone else I’d rather have on my side for this than you.
ALRIGHT! YEAH! IN YOUR FACE!
That means we’re dating now, right?!
Taira! I didn’t say that!
This stuff is all too confusing, with Pac-Man gone and everything that’s happened…
Can’t we just… you know… be friends?
YEAH!!!
FRIENDSHIP RULES!!!
HAW HAW! EAT IT, EVERYBODY ELSE!
${slot:playerName} IS MY FRIEND! YEAH, YOU JEALOUS!
(Heh. I should’ve known Taira would be just as enthusiastic about friendship as he is about…
Everything.)
Come on, buddy!
Let’s go get your katamari from the weapons locker…
Save Pac-Man…
and get MAD REVENGE on Evil Namco High!
C’mon, Cuz! Lemme hear your REVENGE SCREAM!
Uh, y-yeah!
REVENGE…????
Did I do it right?
Was it that bad?!
Yo, that was mad weak, for a revenge-scream.
You totally sure we can do this?
I mean, yeah…
We’ve got to… right?
I dunno…
But I’ll try my best if that’s what you want.
(Jeez, now I’m not too sure myself.
We have no choice but to try anyway…
And if we fail…
At least I’ll have a new friend… to help me get revenge of my own.)
Here goes nothing…?
Taira! There you are!
I was scared you’d try to avoid me again…
Please, let’s talk!
Yo, ${slot:playerName}… don’t do this to me!
I’m so not worthy of your awesome warrior heart!
Taira, that’s just it!
Pac-Man talked to me before he got kidnapped…
That cool yellow dude…
He always says just the right thing…
Right! He talked to me about me and you.
I realized that, maybe I really do have a burning warrior heart.
But you said, maybe you’re the one with the delicate soul…
And you also said, the burning heart is destined to protect the delicate soul!
Yo…
What are you saying?
Taira, I think maybe it’s my destiny…
To protect you.
And maybe take you on a date.
Hey! You’re right!
Maybe, yeah!
Yeah!
Yeah!
Or maybe…
Maybe it’s that we BOTH have fiery warrior hearts, beating as one!
Instead of me having the wussy one!
Uh…
Er…
Yeah! Or maybe that, too!
(No, though.)
So… are you saying you actually want to team up with me?
${slot:playerName}… would you really wanna team up with a jerk like me?
Yes, Taira! I couldn’t do it without you.
${slot:playerName}… thanks for coming to get me.
After I’ve been such a huge jerk about, like… everything.
I wanted to, Taira…
Because I realized…
I actually kinda..
Well, I love you, too.
WHA?? REALLY??!
Haha… yeah…
HAW HAW! YES!
I TOTALLY CALLED IT!
IN YOUR FAAAACE!
Well, now that that’s out of the way…
Taira, come with me!
I think working together…
With our, um, two warrior hearts beating as one…
I think we can save Pac-Man!
...No can do, ${slot:playerName}.
Huh? But why?!
I been hurting peeps for no reason all this time…
I can’t get revenge on anyone anymore.
Not even Evil Namco High.
No more revenge for me, ever!
I totally suck at it, anyway.
But…
Aren’t we supposed to both be doing stuff we love?
Even if we suck at it?
That’s what you said to me, right?
I guess… But…
And anyway, Taira… don’t you get it?
Fighting isn’t always the same as revenge.
Huh?!
If you fight Evil Namco High, but you do it for Pac-Man’s sake, to save him…
And not for the sake of avenging anything or whatever…
Then it won’t be revenge!
You… can fight… without it being revenge?
Um, yeah!
That’s… that’s so awesome!
I gotta tell somebody!
(He’s standing up to address the crowd of our fellow Namco High students…
I guess he seriously is really excited about this?)
EVERYBODY! LISTEN UP!
I HAVE AWESOME NEWS!
WE CAN FIGHT TO SAVE Pac-Man…
WITHOUT IT BEING REVENGE!
Um…
Great...
Thank you for the, um, new information, Taira…
Yeah, that’s…
Really cool news….
Haw! Now I’m all pumped, like before a Wrestleball match!
This RULES!
Haha, good.
Ready to go get Pac-Man back, then?
Totally!
But…
I promise I won’t get any revenge on Evil Namco High after.
Okay, Taira…
But I might!
Just a little bit!
Haw haw! ${slot:playerName}, I told you…
You’ve totally got a warrior’s heart.
Team up with Terezi?
Sure!
Maybe not...
H3Y COTTON C4NDY!
W4NN4 T34M UP 4ND H3LP M3 F1GHT 3V1L N4MCO H1GH?
1 PROM1S3 1 WON’T DOUBL3 CROSS YOU >:P
Yeah, not a chance.
Hey Terezi!
Listen, I know you’re a little… weird…
But I kinda feel like I can trust you?
For... some insane reason.
Will you team up with me to fight Evil Namco High?
S3R1OUSLY?
4R3 YOU SUR3 YOU W4NT TO T34M UP W1TH M3?
Um….
1 M34N, 1 4M PR3TTY 4W3SOM3, BUT…
Yes! Let’s do it!
OK4Y
WH4T3V3R YOU S4Y!
JUST SO YOU KNOW THOUGH
W3’R3 D3F1N1T3LY GO1NG TO LOS3
Yeah, but you’re just saying that because you like to say mean things….
And try to trick me and stuff, right?
NOP3 1’M B31NG ON3 HUNDR3D P3RC3NT HON3ST
W1TH MY M1ND POW3RS, 1 C4N S33 3V3RY POSS1BL3 R3SULT OF OUR 4CT1ONS 4FT3R TH1S PO1NT
4ND 3V3RY S1NGL3 P4TH 3NDS TH3 S4M3 W4Y
W1TH US G3TT1NG OUR BUTTS H4ND3D TO US
...Welp.
Terezi! I’m so glad I found you…
1’M SO S4D 4BOUT WH4T H4PP3N3D TO P4CM4N!
1 M1SS H1S L3MON T4RT SC3NT ON TH3 41R…
I know, I feel the same way!
...Well, maybe not about the scent part.
But I think maybe… together…
we can get him back?
${slot:playerName}…
4R3 YOU SUR3 TH4T’S 4 GOOD 1D34?
1T W4S STUP1D OF M3 TO TRY TO G3T YOU TO 4CC3PT 4 BL4CK ROM4NC3...
YOU’R3 OBV1OUSLY NOT BU1LT FOR TH4T K1ND OF TH1NG
1T’S NOT F41R TO 4SK YOU TO TRY
1 SHOULD H4V3 B33N 4BL3 TO S33 TH4T FROM TH3 ST4RT
Heh… or smell it, at least?
1T’S NOT COOL TO M4K3 FUN OF SOM3ON3’S D1S4B1L1TY
Augh! I’m sorry!!
H3H3H3 >:P
1’LL F1GHT W1TH YOU BUT…
ONLY 1F YOU’R3 SUR3 TH4T’S WH4T YOU W4NT!
Terezi, I know all this “black romance” stuff is pretty alien to me…
But I know that I feel… well…
SOMETHING for you!
Maybe that something is some kind of weird hate-romance??
It’s hard to know for sure…
But maybe we can keep spending time together…
And see where this goes?
TH4T SOUNDS PR3TTY COOL TO M3, COTTON C4NDY
OK4Y, 1’M CONV1NC3D!
L3T’S GO BR1NG JUST1C3 TO 3V1L N4MCO H1GH!
Wait! Just one thing…
I got my katamari back from the confiscated weapons locker…
And look who I found stuck on it!
PYR4SP1T3!!! <3
YOU BROUGHT H1M B4CK TO M3!!
Heh heh! Of course I did!
...JUST SO YOU KNOW
R3UN1T1NG M3 W1TH 4 LONG-LOST TR34SUR3…
1S TH3 SORT OF TH1NG TH4T’S R34LLY MOR3 SU1T3D FOR 4 R3D ROM4NC3
Oh. Sorry.
I’m new to this “kismesis” thing…
1’LL L3T 1T SL1D3 JUST TH1S ONC3 >:P
Shall we go rescue Pac-Man, then?
4FT3R YOU, COTTON C4NDY!
H3H3H3H3!
Team up with super hot Tomari?
YES.
Keep looking.
How could we ever rescue Pac-Man from Evil Namco High without your Super Robot?!
We’re DOOMED! Just like you said, only differently!
It’s worse than you think, ${slot:playerName}.
The shadowy figure who ruined the engineering club and destroyed my Super Robot?
I didn’t want to worry you, but…
...he also stole all my incredibly detailed design documents too!
Gasp!
Correct!
Not only did Evil Namco High kidnap Pac-Man, but they’re defending their turf with an ARMY OF SUPER ROBOTS BASED ON MY INCREDIBLY GOOD DESIGNS!
Oh, noooooo!
That sounds really impossible to overcome!
Well, it would be. But they’ve got one weakness.
And that weakness is that I KNOW BEST HOW TO DESTROY THEM!!!
Oh my gosh! Of course! Because you designed them!
Precisely.
And now that my glasses have been released from the weapons locker…
(THE GLASSES ARE THE KEY TO HIS INTELLIGENCE AND ALSO HIS HOTNESS!!!)
Let’s science up a solution.
TOGETHER.
Tomari, I…
Okay, yes. With your glasses on you are completely unstoppably hot.
I mean. Smart. Yes.
(Nailed it.)
Uh, let’s go!
I, um.
Well, I dunno. Gimme a few minutes.
How could we ever rescue Pac-Man from Evil Namco High without your Super Robot?!
We’re DOOMED! Just like you said, only a little differently!
It’s worse than you think, ${slot:playerName}.
I’m ready to science up a solution.
Tomari, you’re a brilliant scientist, but unless you’ve got a doomsday gun or an invincible robot in your garage, you’re just gonna get in the way!
Well, no, I don’t have those. But what I DO have might be even better!
Yeah, yeah. Save it, bookworm.
NEXT!
These are only ballpark figures, but my calculations show that our delay will give Evil Namco High a chance to fortify their school.
You’re right. I’m sure with your brains we’ll be unstoppable!
Yeah, well. I’m not so sure about that, Tomari.
Hmm… these glasses are the wrong prescription. Well, I’m sure everything will be ok!
Tomari… I’m over here.
Oh! So you are!
Team up with Valkyrie?
Valkyrie...let's fight together!
(I'll find someone else...)
There’s no one I’d rather have by my side!
Let me think this through…
YES! THE BLOODLUST IS UPON ME!
I DON’T WANNA DIE!
Valkyrie... Let's fight together!
We'll fight together... AND DIE TOGETHER!
Okay, I don't really want to do that second part.
I guess you're right. I still have to find that key...
Haha, it's too bad I can't just roll up every key in Namco City.
... O. M. G. COULD YOU?!
... If doing it on school grounds landed me in detention, I'd guess Namco Prison would be my next stop. I probably shouldn't.
Welllll, that's okay. I still like you.
And besides... There's a battle to be won. Bad guys to pwn.
They'll write songs about us!
There better be a sweet boss MIDI.
(With her sword raised like that... She looks a lot like her namesake.)
(We can do this!)
Ready to pwn some lowlifes?
Valkyrie... Let's fight together!
We'll fight together... AND DIE TOGETHER!
Okay, I don't really want to do that second part.
I guess you're right. I still have to find that key...
Valkyrie... Do you have to go?
${slot:playerName}...
Let's keep our eye on the battle just ahead of us.
That's the only way to survive!
R-right!
Are we doing this?
Valkyrie... Let's fight together!
We'll fight together... AND DIE TOGETHER!
YEAAAAH!
Wait what?
Ready to die as a warrior?
Valkyrie... Let's fight together!
SMH... sorry… I have something I have to do. Alone.
